relationships.description: Attorney offering legal assistance and expressing support
Mutual friend who introduced Schoen to Epstein
Mentioned as someone lawyers are trying to tie Epstein to for financial gain

analysis.purpose: To express support for Jeffrey Epstein regarding ongoing legal matters and media coverage, and offer legal assistance
analysis.significance: Shows an attorney reaching out to Epstein multiple times over years offering legal help, discussing high-profile connections, and expressing frustration with how Epstein is being treated legally and in media

concerns: Mention of civil cases and depositions

notable_quotes: "Well i should have figured it was only a matter of time before some other brilliant lawyer tried to find a way to tie you to Trump and see if he could money off it"
"Your situation seems to me to raise the combination of friends you have been very good to using all you gave them and then ditching you and sharks swarming when they smell blood"
red_flags: Pattern of lawyers targeting high-profile individuals for financial gain
References to friends abandoning Epstein after receiving benefits

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found. The communication is supportive and offers legal assistance.

illegal_activity.description: No first-hand illegal activity discussed. The email discusses legal matters, media coverage, and offers of legal assistance.

details: Fox News piece rehashing old stories
Media dragging Epstein's name through the press
Media creating new angles to get Epstein in headlines

public_knowledge.context: This email references media coverage of Jeffrey Epstein's legal issues and connections to high-profile figures like Trump and Clinton, which were already becoming public knowledge by 2016

analysis.summary: Attorney David Schoen emails Jeffrey Epstein expressing frustration about lawyers trying to tie him to Trump for financial gain and media coverage of his legal issues. Schoen offers legal assistance and discusses their previous communications about various legal matters, showing ongoing professional relationship and support for Epstein.
